data.text: @DPCDSBSchools Thank you for this message. Let's move on and give children their lives back!

@plum416 @DPCDSBSchools You are right, however, it's part of growing up. Bullying is around and learning how to cope and deal with bullies, prepares children for life. it's painful and I've seen my own children bullied (not over masks) but they must move on. Being muzzled infinitely is not sustainable.
@plum416 @DPCDSBSchools Great news!!! Everyone can choose if they want to wear a mask, or not!

@DPCDSBSchools Will you follow the lead that other school boards are taking and seek to implement continued use of masks despite the CMOH? What are you doing to ensure our children are safe from a known airborne virus?
@DorothyCala @DPCDSBSchools @StMatthewDPCDSB I know!! I think I miss pizza days more then my kids haha

@MWeiham @DPCDSBSchools Why? So our children can end up like you full of spite and hatred? Or have to endure 12 years of learning beside the spawns of people like you? Spawns of Satan....
Get help sir, your anger goes way beyond catholicism.

@MWeiham @plum416 @M58852186 @DPCDSBSchools What is wrong with you? Seriously I hope you find peace in your life because it takes a certain type of sick person to say such disturbing things on a school boards Twitter page. Please seek help.....
@DPCDSBSchools Stop.  Abusing.  Children.  Masking is child abuse.  You want to keep it up you’re a sadist.
@DPCDSBSchools Thank you and this is welcome news!
